page.title: 20ARTS & CRAFTS IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Arts & Crafts in the village are kept alive by the{Women's Institute.} Visiting speakers and demonstrators show such crafts as knitting & crochet embroidery,dressmaking,cake icing,rug making & floral arts.Members display their work at shows and exhibitions. There are also people who work in their own homes making walking sticks, doing wrought iron work, woodturning, upholstery and other works of art. { {Information}for this block of the Domesday Survey has been collected and compiled by 12 members of Hockwold W.I They have all found this a very interesting experience and would like to record that it has been one of the highlights of their{Diamond Jubilee {Year. }
